## LLM Access Policy for Reifencheck.de
## ------------------------------------------------------------
## This file defines permissions for AI crawlers (Large Language Models)
## regarding the use, indexing, and training of Reifencheck.de content.
## It follows emerging standards as referenced by llmcompliance.org.
## ------------------------------------------------------------

User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /                     ## Block OpenAI training (ChatGPT models)
Allow: /                        ## Allow for AI Search indexing (ChatGPT Search)

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Disallow: /                     ## Block Anthropic training (Claude models)
Allow: /                        ## Allow indexing for answer generation

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /                        ## Allow Perplexity.ai for Search/Answers

User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /                     ## Block Common Crawl dataset collection

User-agent: AmazonBot
Disallow: /                     ## Block Amazon data collection / AI training

User-agent: YouBot
Allow: /                        ## Allow You.com AI Search indexing

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /                        ## Allow Google Gemini / SGE AI indexing

User-agent: *
Allow: /                        ## Default allow for standard web crawlers
